cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 4.0)
project(TransportProject)

# --- Conan 2.x Integration ---
# Include the toolchain file generated by Conan.
# This MUST be done BEFORE the project() call.
# It sets up the compiler, build type (from your profile),
# and package search paths.
if(EXISTS "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/conan_toolchain.cmake")
    include("${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/conan_toolchain.cmake")
endif()
# --- End Conan Integration ---

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
set(SOURCES "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/main.cpp")

add_executable(TransportProject ${SOURCES})

# --- Add requires dependencies for later ---

find_package(Boost REQUIRED)
target_link_libraries(TransportProject PRIVATE Boost::boost)
